# UMRR Pool 12 Forestry HREP: Ecological Modeling
Ecological modeling for the Upper Mississippi River Restoration (UMRR) Pool 12 Forestry Habitat Rehabilitation and Enhancement Project (HREP) feasibility study.

## Description

<img src="figures/r_logo.png" width=50 align="left" />

This repo contains the code for ecological modeling for the Upper Mississippi River Restoration (UMRR) Pool 12 Forestry Habitat Rehabilitation and Enhancement Project (HREP) feasibility study.

<img src="figures/USACE-Logo-Horizontal.png" width=250 align="right" />
